page.title: 01GENERAL SURVEY
page.content: This area is on the N-E boundary of Huddersfield(Kirklees).The two large urban{housing}estates of Deighton and Rawthorpe contrast with the rural village of Upper Hopton and the developing village of Kirkheaton.Farms overlooking the River Colne contrast sharply with the modern{technology}of I.C.I. and Holliday's chemical works and the Sewerage works.Along the valley can be seen the main forms of {transport}-A62 Huddersfield-Leeds road,trans-Pennine railway,River Colne and the Ramsden Canal.The{population is cosmopolitan-some resident's of Upper Hopton and Kirkheaton have lived there all their life and seem to resent the intrusion of the 20th century-whilst in Deighton and Rawthorpe can be seen people from many countries.
